Source Emissions | Thermal Oxidizer Emissions The Thermal Oxidizer experienced mechanical issues in 2016 that made it difficult to obtain calculations for the flow rate. The 2015 value has been used here instead, which is a conservative estimate due to the mechanical issues that the Thermal Oxidizer has been experiencing.
